Episodes.Title: Occupation
Episodes.Plot: Tigh, Tyrol and Anders lead the Resistance on New Caprica to increasingly deadly attacks against the Cylons. Kara finds herself trapped in a new life with Leoben Conoy, and Duck makes a fateful decision.Meanwhile on Galactica, Adama struggles with the question of whether to return to New Caprica to mount a rescue attempt.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Christian Tessier

Episodes.Title: Precipice
Episodes.Plot: Adama plans to return to New Caprica and drop off a surprising person to act as a liason between Galactica and the Resistance.Tigh's insistence on the use of suicide bombers and ever escalating violence stuns even the fellow leaders of the Resistance. Eventually, the suicide bombings cause the Cylon occupiers to crackdown on their human subjects.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Madeline Parker

Episodes.Title: Exodus (1)
Episodes.Plot: Sharon helps the Resistance on New Caprica as Adama leads Galactica on a dangerous rescue operation.Tyrol races to save Cally from the execution squad. Meanwhile Anders uncovers treachery among the humans.D'Anna Biers/Number Three meets the Oracle Selloi after having strange dreams about the temple.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Amanda Plummer, Erica Cerra, Kate Vernon, Kandyse McClure, Tahmoh Penikett, Alessandro Juliani, Nicki Clyne, Callum Keith Rennie, Madeline Parker, Donnelly Rhodes, Matthew Bennett, Leah Cairns

Episodes.Title: Exodus (2)
Episodes.Plot: Tigh must decide the fate of his wife Ellen after the assistance she rendered to the Cylons.Lee struggles with his assignment to protect the civilian fleet on its journey toward Earth while Adama returns to New Caprica with just the Galactica.The Resistance coordinates an attack on the Cylons just as Galactica arrives. As the Cylons begin to lose control, Number Three (D'Anna Biers) vows to put a final end to the New Caprican experiment.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Emilie Ullerup, Madeline Parker, Erica Cerra, Kate Vernon

Episodes.Title: Collaborators
Episodes.Plot: Tyrol participates in the Circle, a secret tribunal on Galactica that tries and convicts in absentia those accused of collaborating with the Cylons during the Occupation.The death sentences--administered without the knowledge of Roslin or Adama--begin to weigh on Tyrol's conscience.Baltar faces a similar jury among the Cylons, who must decide whether he is allowed to stay with them.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Winston Rekert, Alisen Down, Alessandro Juliani

Episodes.Title: Torn (1)
Episodes.Plot: Lingering feelings of rage lead Saul Tigh and Kara Thrace to cause problems aboard Galactica between the survivors from New Caprica and those who stayed with the fleet during the Occupation. Baltar assists the Cylons in an attempt to stay alive and uncovers details about Cylon civilization. A Cylon baseship falls victim to a mysterious disease.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Emilie Ullerup, Alessandro Juliani, Rachel Hayward, Nicki Clyne, Madeline Parker

Episodes.Title: A Measure of Salvation (2)
Episodes.Plot: Apollo formulates a plan that threatens the very existence of the Cylon culture. Adama and Roslin must decide whether to follow through on the plan to use a biological weapon against the Cylons.D'Anna Biers (Number Three) believes Baltar knows who created the virus that infected and disabled the Cylon baseship. She is willing to take extreme measures to learn the truth.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Kandyse McClure,  Alessandro Juliani,  Matthew Bennett,  Rick Worthy

Episodes.Title: Hero
Episodes.Plot: A figure from Adama's past returns to haunt him. His return raises questions about why the Cylons launched their initial attack against the Twelve Colonies.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Matthew Bennett, Barry Kennedy, Kandyse McClure, Tahmoh Penikett, Carl Lumbly, Alessandro Juliani

Episodes.Title: Unfinished Business
Episodes.Plot: Adama stages a boxing tournament on the Galactica to help the crew relax. The competitive atmosphere sets off a brutal match between Kara and Lee. Flashbacks from New Caprica reveal the origin and nature of their dispute.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Luciana Carro, Nicki Clyne, Donnelly Rhodes, Tahmoh Penikett, Alessandro Juliani, Kandyse McClure, Kate Vernon, Christian Tessier

Episodes.Title: The Passage
Episodes.Plot: The Colonial fleet faces starvation when the food-processing machines are contaminated. Kat plays a vital role in the success or failure of the "Passage" through space.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Donnelly Rhodes, Kandyse McClure, Alessandro Juliani, Ian Rozylo, G. Patrick Currie, Lucy Lawless

Episodes.Title: The Eye of Jupiter (1)
Episodes.Plot: Tyrol discovers the Temple of Five on the algae planet. The temple may hold the Eye of Jupiter, which is believed to show the way to Earth. The Cylons take a keen interest in the discovery.Athena learns that her baby, Hera, may still be alive. Lee relies on Anders to help build civilian support for the protection of the Eye. His relationship with Kara complicates matters.
Episodes.GuestStars: Kandyse McClure, Dean Stockwell, Alessandro Juliani, Tahmoh Penikett, Callum Keith Rennie, Aleks Paunovic, Lucy Lawless, Diego Diablo Del Mar

Episodes.Title: Rapture (2)
Episodes.Plot: D'Anna/Number Three squares off against Adama over the Temple of the Five. Athena asks for Helo's aid in her plan to rescue Hera.On the algae planet, Apollo orders Dee to leave her defended position in order to save Kara. Anders helps Apollo to hold off the Cylon Centurion attack.Another copy of D'Anna finds the Temple and continues her search for the identities of the Final Five. Her messianic complex begins to concern the other Cylons.
Episodes.GuestStars: Alessandro Juliani, Nicki Clyne, Dean Stockwell, Callum Keith Rennie, Lucy Lawless, Alisen Down, Kandyse McClure, Diego Diablo Del Mar, Brad Dryborough, Aleks Paunovic, Tygh Runyan

Episodes.Title: Taking a Break from All Your Worries
Episodes.Plot: Now onboard Galactica, Baltar faces charges of treason. He contemplates suicide with the help of Number Six. Questions remain about his true identity. Is he a Cylon or isn't he?Apollo shows off the new drinking establishment on Galactica, Joe's Bar, to Tyrol. Apollo thinks about Kara and wonders whether his marriage to Dee is worth saving.
Episodes.GuestStars: Tom Bower, Steve Lawlor, Graeme Duffy, Jason Bryden, Kandyse McClure, Donnelly Rhodes, Alessandro Juliani

Episodes.Title: The Woman King
Episodes.Plot: The Sagittarons allege that a doctor is discriminating against them. As Helo investigates, he becomes concerned that the doctor may even be murdering patients. Meanwhile, Athena unwittingly brings Hera to the doctor for treatment.
Episodes.GuestStars: Gabrielle Rose, Ryan Robbins, Bruce Davison, Nicki Clyne, Donnelly Rhodes, Kandyse McClure, Alessandro Juliani, Richard Hatch

Episodes.Title: A Day in the Life
Episodes.Plot: Chief Tyrol and his wife Cally become trapped in a malfunctioning airlock.Adama remembers his late wife Carolanne as he marks his wedding anniversary. His relationship with President Roslin continues to become more friendly and personal.
Episodes.GuestStars: Bodie Olmos, Michael Leisen, Lucinda Jenney, Alessandro Juliani, Kandyse McClure, Finn Devit, Nicki Clyne

Episodes.Title: Dirty Hands
Episodes.Plot: Amid a heated labor dispute, Tyrol asks the imprisoned Baltar for advice. Seelix becomes involved after she is turned down for flight training.
Episodes.GuestStars: Samuel Patrick Chu,  David Patrick Green,  Jerry Wasserman,  Bryce Hodgson,  Leah Cairns,  Colin Lawrence,  Wesley Salter,  Colin Corrigan,  Nicki Clyne,  Samantha Ferris

Episodes.Title: Maelstrom
Episodes.Plot: Kara continues to have dreams about Leoben Conoy and the mandala she painted at her old apartment on Caprica. While on patrol in her Viper, she encounters a Cylon Heavy Raider.When Tyrol cannot verify Kara's claim that the Cylon ship struck the Viper, Admiral Adama and Lee become concerned about her mental stability.
Episodes.GuestStars: Alessandro Juliani, Kandyse McClure, Bodie Olmos, Erika-Shaye Gair, Georgia Craig, Michael Trucco, Tahmoh Penikett, Dorothy Lyman, Callum Keith Rennie

Episodes.Title: The Son Also Rises
Episodes.Plot: When Baltar's representatives face assassination attempts, Adama asks Lee to protect Baltar's lawyer. After taking on the assignment, Lee seeks to play an active role in Baltar's defense.
Episodes.GuestStars: Tyler McClendon, Kandyse McClure, Ty Olsson, Don Thompson, Alessandro Juliani, Tahmoh Penikett, Bodie Olmos, Nicki Clyne, Michael Trucco, Mark A. Sheppard

Episodes.Title: Crossroads (1)
Episodes.Plot: Baltar's trial testimony threatens the very stability of the fleet. Lee assists Romo Lampkin in Baltar's defense.Some in the fleet begin to feel that Baltar is divine. Though he dismisses such beliefs, Number Six suggests that the followers may know more about his true nature than Baltar does himself.
Episodes.GuestStars: William Samples, Susan Hogan, Nicki Clyne, Mark A. Sheppard, Keegan Connor Tracy, Alison Matthews, Colin Lawrence, Leah Cairns, Ryan Robbins, Chelah Horsdal, Michael Trucco, Kandyse McClure, Alessandr

Episodes.Title: Crossroads (2)
Episodes.Plot: As Baltar's trial comes to a conclusion, key members of the fleet discover that they may be the Final Five Cylons. Tigh attempts to decipher the strange music he is hearing in his head, while a Cylon fleet approaches.
Episodes.GuestStars: Nicki Clyne,  Mark A. Sheppard,  Chelah Horsdal,  Alessandro Juliani,  Susan Hogan,  Brad Dryborough,  William Samples,  Stephen Holmes, Keegan Connor Tracy,  Alison Matthews,  Jennifer Halley,  Donnelly Rhodes
